VIII. CLOSER RELATIONSHIP ORGANIZATIONALLY
In addition to the close cooperation and mutual under¬
standing which has been evident on the part of all NAEB abd NETRC
officers and staff immediately involved in the present discussions
and which gives excellent promise of smooth working relationships
in the future, two specific procedural suggestions have been made*
(1) NETRC intends to invite the President of NAEB to
be a guest at all regular Affiliates Meetings, and also to be
in attendance at all meetings of the NETRC Affiliates Committee
called by the Center <>
(2) NAEB is exploring the possibility of allowing some
similar Center representation at the NAEB board meetings0
